original_text: So they quickly took sheep, cows and calves from the Philistines as food to eat. The soldiers were so hungry that they killed the animals on the ground. Then they ate the meat with the blood still in it.
korean_text: 백성이 이에 탈취한 물건에 달려가서 양과 소와 송아지들을 끌어다가 그것을 땅에서 잡아 피째 먹었더니

sentences.original_text: So they quickly took sheep, cows and calves
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 양과 소와 송아지를 빨리 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: from the Philistines as food to eat
that they killed the animals on the ground
with the blood still in it
